definition: to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Touch and move trigger of catapult and see changes of power.
sentences.chinese: 触摸和移动触发弹射器，看到力的转变。

sentences.english: It is the collapsing of the Expander that triggers the Adorer clean up code.
sentences.chinese: 这是崩溃的膨胀触发崇拜者清理代码。

sentences.english: When the rectangle's events are triggered, the text's attributes change accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 触发矩形的事件时，文本的属性就会相应地改变。

sentences.english: Tailor-made dynamic contact resistance of gold hit the brake trigger switch, a permanent warranty.
sentences.chinese: 黄金接点特制耐动击刹车触发开关，永久保用。

sentences.english: Tokens can be created by a time trigger, which is the default.
sentences.chinese: 令牌可由时间触发器创建，这是缺省设置。

sentences.english: Collisions between the gas clouds may trigger a stellar baby boom .
sentences.chinese: 气体云之间的碰撞可能会触发产星高潮。

sentences.english: A hydrogen bomb has a built-in atomic bomb, which is needed to trigger the fusion reaction.
sentences.chinese: 氢弹内置了一颗原子弹，用于触发聚变反应。

sentences.english: The commercial-use power source voltage waveform will become the trigger signal source.
sentences.chinese: 使用商业用之市电电压源做为触发信号源。

sentences.english: The application of this type of double-edge-triggered flip-flop in seq…
sentences.chinese: 文章还介绍了该双边沿触发器在时序电路中的应用。

sentences.english: Power loss in the inducer would trigger the deck's playback circuit.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引导器断电，终端的回放电路就会被触发。

sentences.english: For example, each time a new product name is added, you can have it trigger a batch update .
sentences.chinese: 例如，每当添加新产品名时，可以让它触发批量更新。

sentences.english: Obtaining and manipulating one or more values in the triggering event.
sentences.chinese: 在触发事件中获取或操作一或多个值。

sentences.english: This ability can now trigger while the Warlock is sitting.
sentences.chinese: 现在术士坐着时可以触发。

sentences.english: The final step is to configure the queue manager for triggering.
sentences.chinese: 最后的步骤是配置队列管理器以进行触发。

sentences.english: Forexample, use sound to indicate that the user has just triggered an event.
sentences.chinese: 例如，使用声音去提示用户已经触发了一个事件。

sentences.english: To trigger the cameras, you have to move over the loops at a particular speed.
sentences.chinese: 为了触发摄相机，你必须以特定的速度在环上移动。

definition: to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
to cause to burn/to ignite/to detonate/a fuse
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
